Supported stack

Information about supported stack

Semaphore can build Rails 3 applications based on Ruby 1.9 and Bundler. It supports the following:

Database engines

  • PostgreSQL
  • MySQL
  • SQLite
  • Redis

Test frameworks

  • RSpec
  • Cucumber with Capybara and Selenium
  • test/unit

We have a number of open source test apps in various flavors that we use for verification. If your setup is different, we encourage you to read that page and contact us – we’d be happy to get your app building on Semaphore as quickly as possible.

Articles

  • Adding a new project
  • Collaborator notifications
  • Supported stack
  • Test apps

Semaphore is a service by Rendered Text.
